name: Scyphophobia
description:
When you decide to spend the night at the home of a friend,
Things Go Wrong
And you come across a large alien UFO.
who is willing to kill you
It's dark outside, the Predator is hungry, you must survive the night and escape the UFO stalker. 
"It Feels Like An 80's Thriller, I Personally Loved it!" -pogchampstudios
"The UFO is absolutely Terrifying and the sound design is insane!" -Sock Sprite
"the music is orchestrated so well, and the visuals are out of the roof! i would say this is a pretty well made short horror flick, 8.6/10" -inxgo
